summary: DevSlashNull, re: user saying they're going to try
mainText: 'This was rolled out today specifically, should automatically apply to any profile that doesn't have a license already. Let me know how it goes'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: keeping name and buying edition again for it
mainText: 'If you buy any edition it will automatically apply it to that profile first rather than making a new one, so you wont lose the name'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: user reporting error
mainText: 'This happens if you refund or charged back a purchase, please get in touch with the support team so they can take a look'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: offer to Apple
mainText: '@Apple hmu, ill get your name for u'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: offer to Apple
mainText: 'I will up it to 2 copies if done by monday'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: Slikey's discussion abt waiting for Apple to approve Hytale
mainText: 'Apple plz, I will trade you 1 Cursebreaker copy for approval of our dev account'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: support tickets
mainText: 'We're working on tooling that will help support verify and reset 2fa methods for folks that have locked themselves out, plz keep an eye on your ticket and they'll be in touch as soon as theyre good to go'

summary: Simon, re: gameplay options
mainText: 'yeah lots of insane potential, let us cook üòé'

summary: Simon, re: Path of Exile elements he'd consider adding to Hytale
mainText:
'I like their gems system in PoE2, allows people to be creative with their setup.
Imagine you could modify a bow to do ricochet arrows and it up with multi shot etc

This is very long term. Maybe never gonna happen, but would be fun to experiment! At least I would mod it lol'

summary: Simon, re: benefits of no character-based progression
mainText: 'Allows friends to join in and give them gear, no need to grind to artificially catch up'
